trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, represents a data store for writing and reading user annotations.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se invalida en una clase derivada, representa un almacén de datos para escribir y leer anotaciones de usuario.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" />.

trans-unit.source: The annotation to add to the store.
trans-unit.target: Anotación que se va a agregar al almacén.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> to the store.
trans-unit.target: Agrega un nuevo objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> al almacén.

trans-unit.source: When a new <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> is added to the store its [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/includes/tlasharptla-guid-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> property is set to a new value.
trans-unit.target: Cuando una nueva <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> se agrega al almacén de su [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/includes/tlasharptla-guid-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> propiedad se establece en un nuevo valor.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AddAnnotation%2A> is called, its <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> property is checked to see if the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> already has been added to the store.
trans-unit.target: Cuando <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AddAnnotation%2A> se llama, su <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> propiedad se comprueba para ver si el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> ya se ha agregado al almacén.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> already has been added and exists in the store (as determined by its <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> property) an <xref:System.ArgumentException> error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> ya se ha agregado y existe en el almacén (según lo determinado por su <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> propiedad) un <xref:System.ArgumentException> se produce el error.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="newAnnotation" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="newAnnotation" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> with the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id" /> property value already exists in the store.
trans-unit.target: Ya existe una <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> con el mismo valor de la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id" /> en el almacén.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" /> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" /> se ha llamado en el almacén.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an anchor on any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> in the store changes.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando cambia un delimitador en cualquier <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> del almacén.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged> event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A> contained in the store without the need to register on each <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> individually.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged> evento puede utilizarse para supervisar los cambios en la anotación <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A> contenida en el almacén sin necesidad de registrar en cada <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> individualmente.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an author on any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> in the store changes.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando cambia un autor en cualquier <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> del almacén.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged> event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors%2A> contained in the store without the need to register on each <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> individually.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged> evento puede utilizarse para supervisar los cambios en la anotación <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors%2A> contenida en el almacén sin necesidad de registrar en cada <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> individualmente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data in annotation buffers is to be written immediately to the physical data store.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si los datos en búferes de anotación se escriben de inmediato en el almacén de datos físico.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if data in annotation buffers is to be written immediately to the physical data store for each operation; otherwise, <see langword="false" /> if data in the annotation buffers is to be written when the application explicitly calls <see cref="M:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si los datos en búferes de anotación se escriben de inmediato en el almacén de datos físico para cada operación; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" /> si los datos en búferes de anotación se escriben cuando la aplicación llame explícitamente a <see cref="M:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush" />.

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an explicit-save model can set <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A> to `false` and call <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> directly when appropriate.
trans-unit.target: Las aplicaciones que utilizan un modelo de guardar explícito pueden establecer <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A> a `false` y llame a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> directamente cuando sea necesario.

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an implicit-save model can set <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A> to `true` to cause <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> to be called automatically after every store operation (add, delete, or modify).
trans-unit.target: Las aplicaciones que utilizan un modelo de guardar implícito pueden establecer <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A> a `true` provocar <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> que se llame automáticamente después de cada operación de almacén (agregar, eliminar o modificar).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cargo on any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> in the store changes.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando cambia una carga en cualquier <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> del almacén.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.CargoChanged> event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A> contained in the store without the need to register on each <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> individually.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.CargoChanged> evento puede utilizarse para supervisar los cambios en la anotación <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A> contenida en el almacén sin necesidad de registrar en cada <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> individualmente.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/includes/tlasharptla-guid-md.md)] <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id" /> property of the annotation to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id" /> de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/includes/tlasharptla-guid-md.md)] de la anotación que se va a eliminar.

trans-unit.source: Deletes the annotation with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id" /> from the store.
trans-unit.target: Elimina la anotación con el <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id" /> especificado del almacén.

trans-unit.source: The annotation that was deleted; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if an annotation with the specified <paramref name="annotationId" /> was not found in the store.
trans-unit.target: Anotación eliminada; en caso contrario, <see langword="null" /> si no se encuentra ninguna anotación con el <paramref name="annotationId" /> especificado en el almacén.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.DeleteAnnotation%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra el uso de la <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.DeleteAnnotation%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" /> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" /> se ha llamado en el almacén.

trans-unit.source: Releases resources used by the store.
trans-unit.target: Libera los recursos que utiliza el almacén.

trans-unit.source: Releases all managed and unmanaged resources used by the store.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos los recursos administrados y no administrados que utiliza el almacén.

trans-unit.source: Applications should call <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> when finished with the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>.
trans-unit.target: Las aplicaciones deben llamar a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> cuando haya terminado con el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>.

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> the application can release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> to allow the garbage collector to reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Después de llamar a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> la aplicación puede liberar todas las referencias a la <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> para permitir que el recolector de elementos no utilizados pueda reclamar la memoria que el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> estaba ocupando.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [limpiar recursos no administrados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) y [implementa un método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: The public <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> method calls the protected <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>`(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter of `true` to release all managed and unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Público <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> método llama al método protegido <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> `(Boolean)` método con el `disposing` parámetro de `true` para liberar todos los recursos administrados y no administrados.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> before the last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> is released.
trans-unit.target: Llame a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> antes de la última referencia a la <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> se libera.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> is not called, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> resources will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the store's <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> no se llama, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> recursos no se liberarán hasta que el recolector de elementos no utilizados llama a la tienda <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> para liberar tanto recursos administrados como no administrados; es <see langword="false" /> para liberar únicamente recursos no administrados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the store and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera los recursos no administrados utilizados por el almacén y, de forma opcional, libera los recursos administrados.

trans-unit.source: This protected <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> method is called by the public <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> and <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Esto protegido <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> público llama el método <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> y <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The public <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> invokes the protected <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>`(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Público <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> invoca el protegido <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> `(Boolean)` método con el `disposing` parámetro establecido en `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invoca <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> con `disposing` establecido en `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> releases all resources held by any managed objects that the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> references.
trans-unit.target: Cuando el `disposing` parámetro es `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> versiones todos los recursos contenidos por los administra objetos que el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> referencias.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> also invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> También se invoca el `Dispose()` método de cada objeto que se hace referencia.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> puede recibir varias llamadas de otros objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see cref="M:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />.
trans-unit.target: Al reemplazar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> tenga cuidado de no hacer referencia a objetos que se hayan eliminado en una llamada anterior a <see cref="M:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="" /><see cref="M:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /><see langword="(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre cómo implementar <see langword="" /> <see cref="M:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> <see langword="(Boolean)" />, consulte [implementa un método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> y <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, consulte [limpiar recursos no administrados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) y [reemplazar el método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Guarantees that <see cref="M:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> will eventually be called for this store.
trans-unit.target: Garantiza que se llamará finalmente a <see cref="M:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> para este almacén.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides base <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método invalida base <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The application program should not call <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A> directly.
trans-unit.target: El programa de aplicación no debe llamar a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A> directamente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A> is automatically invoked during garbage collection unless disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A> se invoca automáticamente durante la recolección de elementos no utilizados a menos que deshabilite por una llamada a la <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [métodos de finalización y destructores](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [limpiar recursos no administrados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), y [reemplazar el método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Forces any annotation data retained in internal buffers to be written to the underlying storage device.
trans-unit.target: Fuerza a que cualquier dato de anotación retenido en búferes internos se escriba en el dispositivo de almacenamiento subyacente.

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an explicit-save model can set <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A> to `false` and call <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> directly when appropriate.
trans-unit.target: Las aplicaciones que utilizan un modelo de guardar explícito pueden establecer <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A> a `false` y llame a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> directamente cuando sea necesario.

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an implicit-save model can set the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A> to `true` to cause <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> to be called automatically after every store operation (add, delete, or modify).
trans-unit.target: Las aplicaciones que utilizan un modelo de guardar implícito pueden establecer el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A> a `true` provocar <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> que se llame automáticamente después de cada operación de almacén (agregar, eliminar o modificar).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> method when the application closes the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> método cuando se cierra la aplicación la <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.DeleteAnnotation%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra el uso de la <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.DeleteAnnotation%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" /> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" /> se ha llamado en el almacén.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/includes/tlasharptla-guid-md.md)] <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id" /> property of the annotation to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id" /> de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/includes/tlasharptla-guid-md.md)] de la anotación que se va a devolver.

trans-unit.source: Returns the annotation with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id" /> from the store.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve del almacén la anotación con el <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The annotation with the given <paramref name="annotationId" />; or <see langword="null" />, if an annotation with the specified <paramref name="annotationId" /> was not found in the store.
trans-unit.target: Anotación con el <paramref name="annotationId" /> determinado; o <see langword="null" /> si no se encuentra ninguna anotación con el <paramref name="annotationId" /> especificado en el almacén.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" /> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" /> se ha llamado en el almacén.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of annotations contained in the store.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve una lista de anotaciones contenida en el almacén.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.GetAnnotations%2A> method to determine if there are any annotations contained in the store.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.GetAnnotations%2A> método para determinar si hay alguna anotación contenida en el almacén.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all the annotations in the store.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve una lista de todas las anotaciones del almacén.

trans-unit.source: The list of all annotations currently contained in the store.
trans-unit.target: Lista de todas las anotaciones contenidas actualmente en el almacén.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.GetAnnotations%2A> method to determine if there are any annotations contained in the store.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.GetAnnotations%2A> método para determinar si hay alguna anotación contenida en el almacén.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" /> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" /> se ha llamado en el almacén.

trans-unit.source: The starting <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart" /> sequence to return matching annotations for.
trans-unit.target: Secuencia <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart" /> inicial para la que se devuelven anotaciones que coinciden.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of annotations that have <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors" /> with locators that begin with a matching <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart" /> sequence.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve una lista de anotaciones que tienen <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors" /> con localizadores que comienzan con una secuencia <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart" /> que coincide.

trans-unit.source: The list of annotations that have <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors" /> with locators that start and match the given <paramref name="anchorLocator" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if no matching annotations were found.
trans-unit.target: Lista de anotaciones que tienen <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors" /> con localizadores que se inician y coinciden con el <paramref name="anchorLocator" /> determinado; en caso contrario, <see langword="null" /> si no se encuentra ninguna anotación que coincida.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.GetAnnotations%2A> method internally uses the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.StartsWith%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> class to search and match for the annotations to return.
trans-unit.target: Esto <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.GetAnnotations%2A> método usa internamente el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.StartsWith%2A> método de la <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> class para buscar y hacer coincidir las anotaciones devolver.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" /> has been called.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si se ha llamado a <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" /> has been called; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si se ha llamado a <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" />; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera el evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AuthorChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera el evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AuthorChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.CargoChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera el evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.CargoChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.StoreContentChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera el evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.StoreContentChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> is added to or deleted from the store.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando se agrega o elimina <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> del almacén.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add an event delegate for the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.StoreContentChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo agregar un delegado de eventos para el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.StoreContentChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows operation of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.StoreContentChanged> event delegate.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra el funcionamiento de la <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.StoreContentChanged> delegado de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object to use as a synchronization lock for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" /> critical sections.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto que se va a utilizar como bloqueo de sincronización para las secciones críticas de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" />.

trans-unit.source: The object to use as a synchronization lock for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" /> critical sections.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que se va a utilizar como bloqueo de sincronización para las secciones críticas de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" />.
